You can find modern Tanjore paintings in art galleries, handicraft stores, and online marketplaces. Many artists and artisans sell their Tanjore paintings online, making it easy to browse and purchase from the comfort of your home.

One popular platform to find modern Tanjore paintings is on e-commerce websites such as Amazon, Flipkart, and Etsy. These websites have a wide range of options from different artists, and you can filter your search based on your preferred theme, size, and price range.

Alternatively, you can also visit galleries in India that specialize in Tanjore paintings. Some prominent galleries include Tanjore Arts, Bharath Arts, and Kalaniketan.

If you are in Chennai, you can visit the Government Museum in Egmore, which has a collection of antique Tanjore paintings as well as modern versions. These paintings provide a glimpse into the history of Tanjore paintings and how they have evolved over time.

Overall, there are plenty of options to discover and purchase modern Tanjore paintings.
